metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Usage Of Qemu
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious execution of the Qemu utility in a Windows environment. Threat actors have leveraged this utility and this technique for achieving network access as reported by Kaspersky.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m 1m')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m 2m')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m 3m'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('restrict=off')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-netdev ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('connect=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-nographic')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -cdrom ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' type=virt ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -blockdev '))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious execution of the Qemu utility in a Windows environment. Threat actors have leveraged this utility and this technique for achieving network access as reported by Kaspersky.
